message.body: You are a great granddaughter. I'm proud of you.
We didn't talk about u taking th le car.
Email please
I texted please respond by text
Email
Sorry pocket call
Can we try texting for now and see how it goes.
K
We will be in Swarthmore in about 2 and half. How do you want to do it? I can drop off the kids at 108 and Maman at Wallace's... I can call you when we are close. OK?
That is fine. Are u going to be talking to the kids with me?
When u wrote drop off the kids it didn't sound like u were joining us.
Of course I thought that was the whole point.
Sorry Meant ill take Maman to Wallace and come back to 108
K
Do u want to call me when they are ready?
Do you think you can round them up?
K
Thanks
Regarding the emails you had sent me earlier today, I didn't get a chance to respond yet. I will do tomorrow.
Are you upstairs
Down
I forgot to say I took the toothpaste. I hope you have some more. If not ill return it tomorrow. Sorry about that.
I have some. Thanks

I am going to take the 11:50 train. Maman's leg is hurting her and she can't come with me to Philly. Can she stay in the house. She will be in Soraya's room the whole time while you are here. Alternatively she can go to Wallace's until four ish ? What do you think ?
in Soraya's room she can hear almost everything I say to the kids. I would really appreciate it if she could go to Wallace's so I could have private time with the kids.
K

Coast is clear. Maman is at Wallace's now. She will stay till 4 or if you want a little later. I had to park the car at the train station. Between the bank and looking for my wallet and contacting Soraya all morning I had no time left to walk to the station. Also I could only deposit the $250 but there was a misunderstanding with Soraya and I couldn't get her PIN number. I think I will do that tomorrow.
K
I would prefer if maman came back to the house at 4:20 please. Thanks.
K
Do u know where Soraya is

I had to send a group text to all her friends and some of their moms to find her. She slept over at Rachel's and I am assuming she is still there sleeping. She keeps saying "go away" and does not respond to most of my messages. She is very angry. She has to go to her therapist today. I left her train tickets on the chest. I am hoping she will show up in time. The last I heard from Rachel was that she was alone over there. Everyone is at work etc. you could always drive over and wake her up. Assuming she is still there.
What time does she need to be on the train
I don't know. I can always try to contact dr hunt. But that will be a hassle.
Please send me dr hunts phone if u have it. No point in going to get Soraya if she is already too late.
I talked with Soraya. Her appointment is at 5. She will either call me for a ride home from Rachel's or get home another way.
Great.
ï¿¼
Thanks
It turns out that the book for this week's socio class is about racism. Unfortunately it is the only one that I could not finish reading before class. It is a very good read. Kind of borat in a book.
I'd like to read it
Tony Horwitz Confederates in the attic
Oh right. Thanks
I took the car to the store. Do u want it at home or the station?
So you don't need it for work?
I forgot no dccc these days
No I'm taking train
Ik
Station would be great
We need to call a repair man for the oven. It could be dangerous. Whenever it doesn't heat up there is a string gas smell
Don't know
How are we going to afford it?
What if we just don't use the oven for now
Ok
Whenever u can please let me know day and time u r going to longwood thanks
Is it because you might need the car?
No but I need to work at the house packing stuff.
Thanks

We are planning to go Thursday morning leaving at 8:10 coming back around noon or so. I would like to stay longer but I am not sure about Maman and the heat etc. don't expect us back before noon. I can always text you before we leave there.
I hope you are not going to need your air conditioner for now because Soraya's room is too hot for Maman and I just moved it...
I think Soraya is experienced enough to drive to the former genardies. I need some fruits and I am thinking of asking her to go get some. What do you think?

This is an example where u should have consulted with me. It may seem like a small thing to u but it is important for me to be part of the decision process. Please consult with me on everything to do with the house and our shared property. And the kids. Everything. Please.
I agree that she can go to genuardis.
I'm sleeping now but if there is anything important go ahead and text me please. Thanks
K
Matt and faith consulted and they decided to have the reunion in Maine. They and mom tried very hard to find a way for our kids to go up but they couldn't find a solution.
I don't understand this at all. Are you going?
No
This is very sad. The children need the support of their family. They are going to be very heartbroken and feel totally left out. How is your mom getting up there?
I don't understand how the whole family could not come up with a solution. I guess it is better for them not to go if they are not going to be welcomed and loved.
One would expect that their aunts and uncles will have some compassion for them and try to at least get in touch with them and show them love and give them solace in this very difficult time.
Mom is going with Matt and janelle. Carol is driving up with Mona and Nabil if he goes. There is no room for our kids at faiths house since it is already overcrowded.

I wish they would have thought of pitching in together and paying for their trip and rooms at least for part of the 'reunion'. That is what family is for. Now are kids will have to live with this horrible rejection.
They decided. I didn't even know they were talking about it.
You are free to talk with them directly but I don't think that would change anything.
I think so too. Best to let go.
I will text you after we leave for longwood tomorrow morning. Might be a little later than 8:10
K
Have u left yet

I am so sorry. We left at 8:30. I was overwhelmed with buying train tickets for Soraya. I just pulled over on route 1 to text you because I suddenly remembered....and I saw your text. Very sorry. I will be in touch before we leave longwood.
I wrote a check for 170 for dr hunt. I'm. Pretty sure we don't have enough in the account. I will check and get back to u
K
We are leaving longwood and heading home in 10.

At this time we have $115 available. I just wrote the check for $170 for dr hunt. So I will need to transfer some money from Wells Fargo account. I'm submitting my first unemployment claim now hopefully it will arrive in 2-3 weeks
K
How much should I transfer from ad to FMCU tomorrow
Depends on how many automatic bills are going to come in.
I don't have access to the net here. I have a general idea but it would be easier to do this by phone call
You mean calling the bank
No we consulting by phone
I don't want that
Could you please look into this then? i just realized that you can do it without too much trouble if u go to FMCU website. If u need the login info let me know
I can go into the account easily but I don't have the info regarding the bills and their dates

There will be no car bill till aug 15 No ovlg bill till end of sept (I'm working in switching to a better agency) Aqua may have already been deducted Peco too but check Verizon too but check FMCU loan too but check AT&T check Travelers insurance auto Travelers insurance home
K
I am in the car with Soraya heading home. I have a headache from the sun at longwood. I took 200mg ibp no help yet. I will be in touch after dinner.

I was reminded that maman is leaving in a few days. Please note that I do not agree to allow Soraya to drive more than 2 hours total. She could drive all the way up or all the way back but not both. I am open to consulting about it further but this is my feeling now. Thanks.
Soraya has an appointment with dr hunt that day and can't go the airport
K
BTW hunt emailed yesterday saying that Soraya is making a lot of progress. And Soraya told me last week that she loves her therapist and wishes she could continue with her.
Great
Now Soraya is telling me that the dr agreed to be her therapist for the first two months of college. They will reassess after that...
Super.
Did u let Lua know that we are separated

I just left a message on her phone saying that I would like to talk to her about Tuesday. I will explain that we are separated and also that when we agreed on the date I was not paying attention to the fact that I have class on that day....I will tell you the outcome of the conversation. Did you want me to tell her anything on your behalf?
Nothing on my behalf and I don't need to know about the conversation.
K

What I meant about the outcome of the conversation is if they still want to come and see us separately or something. Which I really doubt. I am not going to suggest anything. It is going to be awkward for them. We are probably going to lose all our common friends.
I'm not in the mood to visit with them but if you don't mind please pass on to them my greetings.
K

Aqua 7/9 Peco 7/11 Verizon 7/2 Ortho 7/5 Fmfcu (it was not named so but showed a 400 some taken. I am assuming it is Fmfcu ) 7/5 There was only one travelers 7/3 There was no AT&T bill (do you pay it automatically?) I didn't think so Do you remember the last time you paid them? So it seems that we are fine till the 2nd. When is the next check (income) coming?
Yes FMCU loan is 400 something. Next pay is July 31.
If we spend only $40/day we will need $600 from the savings to the checking. How about if I spend 30/day and you 10? I will withdraw whatever is my share and spend the cash. Let me know?
Fine. I'll take 130.
K

There is a problem with the kids insurance. Soraya is running out of contact lenses. She has enough to last her one week. She is wearing her last pair now. I called the eye dr to get a small batch to hold her over. They said that they absolutely cannot do that at all. They said that she was due for an eye exam two months ago and they cannot give her any contacts without an eye exam. This is by law. So... The exam alone costs $180 and they couldn't tell me how much the lenses will cost for one month supply. I called CHIP they said that a determination letter was sent out LAST week (which I never received) at a cost of $270.35 per child. They also said that we could appeal it later. She said they can resend the letter of illegibility. I said we don't want to wait. She said we can send a check only (or money order). It will take weeks before the effective date will be given. I am worried we won't make the date for Vassar. I am going to call the congressman and appeal to them. Meanwhile Soraya needs lenses and we have to do the exam and order them latest Monday. What do we do?
Once she gets examined how much do the lenses cost?

Can you tell me when baba got his green card? If it was in or before 2011 then we could get more refund for the 2011 tax. As for the 2012 tax I already included him so no further refund is possible for that year.
They couldn't tell me. I am guessing about $30 max for one month.
He got his green card sometime before 10/2011 but I have to look into it further to find the exact date.
OK it was sometime in 8/2011. Found an old email from farshad....

It looks like we need to get chip for her so she can be waived from vassar insurance. So 2 questions: 1 are you sure she will be covered by chip and have her policy number by August 21? 2 does she have enough contacts to hold her over until chip starts?
If you read my first message you will see the answers there. If it is still not clear let me know

You said weeks which is vague so I Cant advise without more info. asking the congressman to help expedite or at least get a more clear idea of the chip start date would be good. Does she have a pair of glasses with same prescription?
Ok. They said that first they need to receive check by mail. Then they will take two weeks before they send us a letter telling us about the effective date.
Still vague. No idea if we will make it by 21st.
No way to get her covered by bmc early?

Yes she had glasses but they are very ugly. I bought the cheapest ones possible to wear at home. I think she will be very upset if we tell her to go without lenses. Yesterday she was extremely unhappy counting all the 'things' she has been losing recently. Family, extended family, her money, her dream university etc...I think losing her contacts for 6 weeks will be too much to ask of her.
I just checked vassar website and the deadline is now August 16
Another suggestion. Call vassar financial aid and explain we have no insurance and no money for vassar insurance so will bc pay for her insurance

If we send a Check today we might make the deadline. I called Brady's office (we fall under his jurisdiction) and left a message. I will call BMC but I know it is a silly question to ask. They go by contract dates.
What is bc pay?
I meant VC
K
Please do not refer to anything I say in consultation as silly. Thanks.
K
K

BMC is working on it. But no answer yet. They have to consult about it. Slight possibility. They also suggested we buy her insurance from blue cross. I am assuming we can do that only for one month to hold her over.

The AT&T bill came today to Kofi's phone ! It is due immediately about 350. I called them and made arrangement to pay in full by August 15. If you don't think it is a good one you can call the number in the next text and change it. I don't know why it is so high. Maybe you want to call and ask about that.
I need my smart phone. If you want to do the research for two smart phones and three regular...that is fine with me. I don't need a land line.
It is far too complicated to get a clear understanding online. But I did find out that Verizon is more expensive for a family plan than AT&T.
K
Did you deposit the 600
We didn't talk about who was doing that.
It is better if u do that tomorrow morning ASAP because I will be at strayer.
If you go back you will see that you said that in text.
How much should I transfer from ad to FMCU tomorrow
Sorry but I completely forgot.
I just forwarded you text
I'll do it.
Thanks

Can we agree that for the sake of the children we give each other the 'permission' and the expectation to be there for them when they participate in an event. I never said that I don't want to see you. What i want is not to be alone with you, or with you and the children/family only or talk on the phone. The nerve racking is worst when alone. So feel free to come to the mini concert.
What time will it be? I'm not sure Soraya wants me to come. Please check with her again.
She was telling me a few minutes ago that she really wants you to come. It is at 3.
K
Maybe you should tell her so I don't seem to be the go between.
Please do not text me until Monday unless it is important and can't wait. Thanks.
K
I need to pick up some things. Will u be out of the house any time this afternoon? I prefer early afternoon if possible around 2 or 3. I'll need about 30 minutes max
I am out and about running errands with Maman. The kids are still sleeping. we will be back by 3:30
K
